name: Magnemite

passive.name: Magnetic Evolution
passive.effect: If there are two other Magnemite on your bench, you may discard them to search your deck for a Magneton and put it on this card, evolving it. If you do, move their damage counters to the Magneton.

attacks.name: Sonicboom
attacks.effect: Ignore weakness, resistance, and other effects for this attack.

attacks.name: Self-destruct
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage to all Benched Pokemon. You may move an Energy from Magnemite. Either way, it deals 50 damage to itself.

flavor: Magnemite are pests that feed off waste electromagnetic Energy at power plants. Their magnetic fields mess with equipment, and they give nasty shocks to operators.
